articles.description: Scientists at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute looked at the level of dangerous chemicals in blood and urine of 245 volunteers who don't smoke or smoke a combination of weed or tobacco.
articles.content:
Smoking marijuana exposes the body to some of the same toxic chemicals released from tobacco, but at lower levels, according to a new study. 
Scientists at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute and the Cente… [+5057 chars]

articles.title: All 4,000 COVID-19 vaccines distributed out to the Coastal Bend - KIIITV.com
articles.description: Another 4,000 are scheduled to arrive Monday, Jan. 18. The health district said if they arrive on time, another drive-thru clinic could happen on Tuesday, Jan. 19.
articles.content:
